description.GESIMAR: Repair and maintenance of computer equipment. Management of servers and ISP services
description.NTT: Dual boot development using AngularJS (TypeScript) and Angular 13 or higher for the implementation of advanced web solutions. Creation of applications using React 18 and TypeScript to improve the user experience in the services provided to clients. Version management using tools such as GitLab and GitHub to ensure collaboration and effective tracking of changes in libraries and applications. Experience managing application deployments to production and pre-production environments, ensuring a smooth implementation.

hero.description: 3 years of experience. Software Engineer from Seville, Spain Specialized in the development of SPA (typescript) applications
